des: "A zippy spread-in-a-jar that is good with crackers, for stuffing celery, or as a spread in finger sandwiches."
ins: In a medium bowl, mash the pimentos using a fork. Mix in cheese, onion, Worcestershire sauce, and mayonnaise. Season to taste with garlic powder and black pepper. Spoon mixture into a container large enough to hold the pimento spread, and store in the refrigerator.
